about_the_game:
FEAR FA 98 is a horror arcade soccer simulator single player and 2 players local that combines all the competitive elements of the soccer world with the horror aspects that made series like Silent Hill or Manhunt great. Play against the computer, or compete in sinister arcade classic local mode to enjoy with your friends on a terrifying afternoon worthy of the '90s

FEAR FA 98 is an arcade title that aims to create fast-paced and dynamic matches. Quickly choose your team, with exclusive weapons and demonic summons to defeat your opponents. During the match, the environment works against you, with monsters and traps appearing to make the game more interesting. You can also use your weapons to drain the opposing team's strength, with options like axes, rusty scissors, syringes. Additionally, you can summon ancient demons to assist you in battling the enemy forces!

First horror game to combine soccer simulation with terror: A unique blend of soccer gameplay with horror elements.

  • Weapons during matches: Players can use knives, axes, and firearms while competing on the field.

  • Demon summoning: Ability to summon demonic creatures to attack opponents or alter the course of the game.

  • Dangerous stadiums: Playfields filled with traps, monsters, and hidden dangers that affect the flow of the match.

  • Multiplayer modes: Supports 2 players local multiplayer mode, allowing competitive gameplay.

  • Dynamic horror experience: The environment changes in real-time, creating a constant state of tension and surprise

  • Story Mode: Uncover the intricate and thrilling horror story behind the game, connected to the Jacob Jazz universe, where the Earth is ravaged by beings that humanity will soon discover have been living inside the sun for years

    The Earth's core has become a nest of colossal, twisted serpents due to the event that occurred five years ago: "The Transmigration," a dark and forbidden place that the echoes of another civilization called "Noodle Cove," where the bowels of the world churn with an insatiable hunger. On the surface, cities and fields have deformed, turning into fragments of living nightmares.

    There are no survivors, only a new world filled with an unnatural rhythm and the old remnants of a civilization. No one remains as we once knew them. Humanity has perished; now, there is only something that creaks when it moves, that exhales boiling blood, and is filled with evil.

    Now, only FEAR exists.


    Here, the organization of FEAR FA 98 presents some of the official teams you can play with in tournaments and leagues, but remember that you can also create your own online by combining players that best fit your play style!

  • Sectarians: People who strongly follow the beliefs or practices of a particular sect, often to the point of exclusion or hostility toward those outside their group. In extreme cases, sectarianism can lead to violence or conflict, especially when tied to religious or ideological divides.

  • Serial Killers: Individuals who commit a series of murders, typically following a distinct pattern or method. These killers often have psychological motives and may target specific types of victims.

  • Psychopathic nurses: Nurses who exhibit psychopathic traits—such as lack of empathy, manipulativeness, or violent tendencies—while working in healthcare. Some have used their positions of trust to harm patients, making them particularly dangerous.

  • & many more!

short_description: FEAR FA 98: Silent Hill mixed with FIFA 98. Use your enemies' heads as the ball, use knives, and summon demons! the very first survival horror soccer simulator!. Play against the computer, or the classic local mode to enjoy with your friends on a terrifying afternoon worthy of the '90s.
